io.janusproject.services.contextspace

Interface ContextSpaceService

  • All Superinterfaces:
    DependentService, com.google.common.util.concurrent.Service
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    StandardContextSpaceService

    public interface ContextSpaceService
extends DependentService
    This service enables to store the contexts and to manage the spaces in the janus platform.
    Version:
    0.10.0 2019-10-26 19:44:29
    Author:
    Sebastian Rodriguez, Stéphane Galland
    Maven Group Id:
    io.janusproject
    Maven Artifact Id:
    io.janusproject.plugin

      • getContexts

        def getContexts(contextIDs : Collection<UUID>) : SynchronizedCollection<AgentContext> 
        Description copied from interface: ContextSpaceService
        Returns the collection of AgentContext with the given IDs.

        The replies collection is synchronized and any iteration on it must be synchronized on the mutex replies by ContextSpaceService.getLock().

        Parameters:
        contextIDs - the identifiers of the contexts to retreive.
        Returns:
        the collection of AgentContext with the given IDs

      • getContextIDs

        def getContextIDs() : SynchronizedSet<UUID> 
        Description copied from interface: ContextSpaceService
        Returns the set of all agent context IDs stored in this repository.

        The replies collection is synchronized and any iteration on it must be synchronized on the mutex replies by ContextSpaceService.getLock().

        Returns:
        the set of all agent context IDs stored in this repository
